unsigned short int portbase

Detailed Description

TCP/IP and UDP/IP connection class.

Class for openning sockets to connect somewhere or to listening for a connections.

Author:
Marcin Caban
Date:
Thu Jan 17 01:41:18 2002

char *    service,
char *    protocol
)  [private]
 

Opens socket for communicating with TCP or UDP server.

Parameters:
host  hostname or IP address of the server
service  port number of the server
protocol  "TCP" or "UDP"
Returns:
network socket descriptor

int tcpip::passivesock (  char *    service,
char *    protocol,
int    qlen
)  [private]
 

Opens socket for listening for TCP or UDP clients.

Parameters:
service  port number of the server
protocol  "TCP" or "UDP"
qlen  maximal length of requests queue (for UDP qlen = 0)
Returns:
network socket descriptor
Author:
Marcin Caban (based on examples from "Internetworking with TCP/IP" written by Douglas E. Comer and David L. Stevens)

Field Documentation

unsigned short int tcpip::portbase [private]
 

PortBase.

Every port number in this class is incremented by value of this variable.

Todo:
Make availability to change value of this variable, now it is always equal to 0.
